description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to vary condition no.26 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission ref: 164694FUL dated 01/09/2017 as amended by 184888VAR dated 10/01/2020; for phased redevelopment comprising a residential-led mixed use masterplan incorporating residential; flexible commercial and community floor space, in use classes A1/A2/A3/A4/A5/B1/D1 and/or D2 including, a primary school and nursery; a pedestrian / cycle bridge across the Grand Union Canal; car and cycle parking; site wide landscaping and associated works, including highway works; following the demolition of buildings and structures on the site (with the exception of the original elements of the Grade II listed Glaxo House). (EIA Application) (Departure from the Local Plan). - Amendment seeks non-material alterations to Block 6 and Block 8 comprising internal layout changes, commercial floorspace layout, amendments to window locations, materiality, hard and soft landscaping to Block 6, and fire escape routes
decision_conditions: The amended development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
